Reviews.Title: Gift for college student
Reviews.Author: Michael McKenna
Reviews.Content: Bought for son in Architecture progam and says the pictures are incredible.  Going to Europe in Fall and extra lens will be very useful.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
8GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Adapater
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Carry Bag + Mini HDMI to HDMI 6 Foot Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
